item.title: Migrate Cloud Flows and Canvas Apps across tenants
item.description: Introduction If you are a Power App or Power Automate developer, chances are you had to move your creations between SharePoint sites or even Microsoft 365 tenants.

item.title: Create Dataverse Expense Details Table and build a simple Power Apps app using that table
item.description: This article is divided into 2 sections 1; Creating Dataverse Table with Choice, Date, Lookup type columns and 2nd; Creating a simple Power Apps app using that Dataverse table

item.title: Let's tame Dataverse: How to reference Many-to-Many-relationships in Azure Logic Apps
item.description: While building an app that stores data in Dataverse, I came across a not easy to resolve problem.

item.title: TipOfTheDay - Easy Track changes in dataverse table via dataverse API
item.description: Note: I am using PostMan in my example. First - use “GET” http request to get details of dataverse table “Accounts": {{webapiurl}}/accounts?
Note: I am using PostMan in my example. First - use “GET” http request to get details of dataverse table “Accounts": {{webapiurl}}/accounts?
item.dc:creator: Valeras Narbutas
